title: Apple Watch Series 6
description: The latest and greatest from Apple, the Series 6 smart watch offers advanced health monitoring, fitness tracking, and seamless integration with your iPhone.

title: Samsung Galaxy Watch Active 2
description: The Galaxy Watch Active 2 from Samsung offers a sleek design, advanced fitness tracking, and compatibility with both Android and iOS devices.

title: Fitbit Sense
description: The Fitbit Sense offers advanced health monitoring features, including an ECG and stress tracking, as well as fitness and sleep tracking.

title: Amazfit Bip S
description: The Amazfit Bip S is an affordable smartwatch with a long battery life, GPS and fitness tracking, and a variety of watch faces to choose from.

title: Garmin Forerunner 245
description: The Garmin Forerunner 245 is a GPS running watch with advanced training features, including personalized coaching, and can be synced with your smartphone to receive notifications.

title: Withings Steel HR Sport
description: The Withings Steel HR Sport is a hybrid smartwatch with an analog watch face and a digital display for tracking activity, heart rate, and sleep.

title: Skagen Falster 3
description: The Skagen Falster 3 is a stylish smartwatch with fitness tracking, Google Assistant, and compatibility with both Android and iOS devices.

title: TicWatch Pro 4G/LTE
description: The TicWatch Pro 4G/LTE is a smartwatch that can make calls and send messages directly from the watch, with Google Assistant, GPS and fitness tracking.

title: Pebble Time Smartwatch
description: The Pebble Time Smartwatch offers a long battery life and a variety of apps, including fitness and sleep tracking, and can be connected to both Android and iOS devices.

title: Mobvoi Ticwatch E2
description: The Mobvoi Ticwatch E2 is a budget-friendly smartwatch with fitness tracking and Google Assistant, compatible with both Android and iOS devices.

title: Fossil Sport Smartwatch
description: The Fossil Sport Smartwatch is a stylish option with Google Assistant, fitness tracking, and compatibility with both Android and iOS devices.

title: Vivoactive 3 Music
description: The Vivoactive 3 Music is a GPS smartwatch with music storage and advanced fitness tracking, and is compatible with both Android and iOS devices.

title: Michael Kors Access Runway
description: The Michael Kors Access Runway is a stylish smartwatch with fitness tracking and Google Assistant, compatible with both Android and iOS devices.

title: Huawei Watch GT 2 Pro
description: The Huawei Watch GT 2 Pro offers advanced fitness tracking, a long battery life, and integration with the Huawei Health app.

title: Ticwatch S2
description: The Ticwatch S2 is a budget-friendly smartwatch with fitness tracking, Google Assistant, and compatibility with both Android and iOS devices.

title: Zeblaze Thor 5
description: The Zeblaze Thor 5 is a budget-friendly smartwatch with GPS, fitness tracking, and a variety of watch faces to choose from.
